markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Quatoid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=198)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Quatoids are peculiar, mysterious elementals native to the Plane of Water that resemble four-tentacled octopuses with eerily humanoid faces on their mantles.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Quatoid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=198)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 153</row>

**Perception** +18; darkvision

**Languages**
[Aquan](/Languages.aspx?ID=14), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +12, [Elemental Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +17, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +17, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +18 

</row>

**HP** 120

**Immunities**
bleed, paralyzed, poison, sleep

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, fire 5

**Calming Bioluminescence** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) 30 feet. The aura sheds dim light. Creatures in the emanation gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against emotion effects. The quatoid can activate or deactivate its calming bioluminescence as a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tentacle +16 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+6 bludgeoning plus Grab

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 27, attack +17
- **2nd**
[Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=154) (at will)

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  1d12+6 bludgeoning, DC 25

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-45" />
name: Quatoid
